title: Checkbox
description: Interactive element allowing users to select one or more options from a list.

indeterminate.description: When a checkbox is the parent of a set of child checkboxes, the indeterminate state is used on the parent to indicate that some but not all of its children are checked.

disabled.description: When true, the checkbox cannot be interacted with, and renders in muted colors.

reducedTouchTarget.description: When true, the checkbox remove padding for touchscreens and increase density. Note, the checkbox will no longer meet accessibility guidelines for touch.

value.description: The value that will be included if the checkbox is submitted in a form.

ariaLabel.description:
Attached to the aria-label attribute of the host element. In most cases, aria-labelledby will
take precedence so this may be omitted.

ariaLabelledby.description: Users can specify the `aria-labelledby` attribute which will be forwarded to the input element

ariaDescribedby.description: The 'aria-describedby' attribute is read after the element's label and field type.

id.description: A unique id for the checkbox input. If none is supplied, it will be auto-generated.

labelPosition.description: Whether the label should appear after or before the checkbox. Defaults to 'after'

name.description: Name value will be applied to the input element if present

indeterminate.title: indeterminate
indeterminate.description: Whether the checkbox is in an indeterminate state.

props.description: Interactive element allowing users to select one or more options from a list.
